> Turn async generator functions into ES2015 generators

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-transform-async-generator-functions
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-transform-async-generator-functions --dev
```
